verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the Iran nuclear deal ( all times local ) : [ARGM-TMP: 2:50 p.m.] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will announce his decision on the Ira]
